overview: Titus Snow is the larger-than-life TV date-show host – but believe us when we tell you that this programme is absolutely nothing like anything you’ve ever seen before. It’s boy meets boy – but only after they’ve fucked! Trailed as the horniest broadcast ever, the young wanna-be husbands here are only interested in one kind of ring – and it ain’t the kind that you wear on your fingers. Julian Fox, Martin Rivers and new boys Andy Scott and Mark Flynn prove that when it comes to meeting your one true love, hot raw sex is only the beginning!
title: Bareback Fuck Date
